itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Jack D. Evans (birth year unknown) is a Welsh former rugby union and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Newport RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Great Britain and Wales, and at club level for Hunslet, as a fullback, i.e. number 1.
